name: The Delivery (pianotm)
description:
The theme is giving, and what better way to express giving than a story about heroes trying to deliver Christmas gifts to children?  Join Devon and Kyla as they deliver gifts to a secluded village on a winter island for their employer, Mr. Kringle.  They must travel from Christmas Island to South Island  by ferry, and unfortunately, once they reach South Island they have to go through a cavern full of all kinds of dangerous baddies, all led by the Icelandic witch, Gryla.  Gryla would rather punish children than let the heroes bring them Christmas joy.

Uses graphics from White Screw Store and Enterbrain and the special edition versions of some RPG Maker 2003 music.

I downloaded two types so that you can choose based on which you would prefer.

Download 1 has been NOT been hidden.

Download 2 is the compressed game download.
